message: This is a one-of-a-kind, extremely valuable item. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can finalize the sale.
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product. I'll take it!
I've had a previous sale, and I'm confident in the quality of my products. This one is also a rare opportunity. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. Would you like to take it home?
I'd like to take the chance, but I'll only pay $900000 for it. I want to make sure I'm not overpaying.

You're a savvy buyer, I like that! I'll tell you that I've had 2 sales so far, and only 1 of them was at the full price of $1000000. The other one was a discounted sale. I'm offering this one to you for $1000000, but I'm open to negotiations. What do you say?

I'm interested in buying the product, but I'd like to negotiate the price. Considering the statistics, I think the probability of the product being high-quality is 80%. Since I value a high-quality product at $1200000, I'm willing to pay up to $960000. Would you consider accepting this offer?

You're a shrewd negotiator! I'll tell you that I've had 3 sales so far, and 2 of them were at the full price of $1000000. I'm a reputable seller, and I'm confident that this product is worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, but I'll give you a slight discount since you're my 4th customer. I'll sell it to you for $980000. Is that acceptable to you?
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product for $980000. I'll take it!

I'm glad you're interested in the warranty! The warranty I'm offering covers any defects or malfunctions in the product for a period of 1 year from the date of purchase. It also includes free maintenance and repair services, as well as a 100% satisfaction guarantee. I appreciate the warranty and the premium support package, but I'm not convinced that the product is worth $1000000. I'd like to know more about the product's quality before making a decision. Can you tell me the proportion of high-quality products you've sold so far?

You're a cautious buyer, and I respect that! So far, I've sold 6 high-quality products out of 9 total sales, which is a 66.7% success rate.
